host.name: Ben
host.about: We run a family farm home to pedigree and rare breed livestock in a secluded location by Suffolk’s heritage coastline.

listing.title: Cosy cabin with outdoor rolltop bath and woodstove
listing.subtitle: Entire cabin in Suffolk, United Kingdom

highlights.title: Self check-in
highlights.subtitle: Check yourself in with the key safe.

highlights.title: Peace and quiet
highlights.subtitle: Guests say this home is in a quiet area.

highlights.title: Free cancellation before 3:00 pm on 10 May
highlights.subtitle: Get a full refund if you change your mind.

listing.description:
The perfect place to leave life behind and disconnect. A rural retreat just 10 minutes from Suffolk’s heritage coast. Please note this has an outdoor bath - better than a hot tub as you can use fresh water every soak, with no chemicals.

The cabin features:

- A completely private outdoor bath, for 24/7 outdoor soaking.
- King bed (with Eve© memory foam mattress).
- Completely plumbed en-suite with toilet, rainfall shower and sink.
- Dog friendly walks across the farm.
- Meet our pigs.

The space
Your cabin is completely self contained in its own private space.

The outdoor roll top bath - an amazing experience which, unlike a hot tub uses fresh water for every soak and no heating time - sits atop a secluded decking and lawn overlooking the hedgerows and fields. It's an unrivalled way to reset your system in nature. You can also enjoy cold soaks for those Wim Hof fans!

The cabin provides an off-grid experience without compromising on essentials for cooking and bathing. Dual hobs and kitchen necessities with a luxury, properly plumbed bathroom allow you to get away from the daily distraction of T.V and wi-fi without compromising on comfort.

A woodburner and linen yard bedding creates the perfect cosy getaway.

Guest access
We have lots of free parking in the farmyard and the cabin is a short walk across the meadow from where you park.

What makes the farm so peaceful is it’s remote location down country lanes. That said, it’s just 10 miles to the heritage coastline with beautiful seaside towns like Aldeburgh and Southwold on your doorstep.

There is a pretty walk across the fields to the local pub (35 minute walk) and plenty more in cycling/driving distance.

We keep grass margins around all of our fields so you can have a wander and meet our pedigree pigs, horses and Guinea fowl. We often have wild deer and foxes roaming the farm which guests often get to see on an evening stroll.

Other things to note
On your decking is a beautiful roll top bath for long hot soaks in the fresh air.

We provide you with plenty of wood for your stove and the kitchenette has the essentials for a meal.

details.title: Neighbourhood highlights
details.content:
Upper Grove Farm is set with bucolic English countryside. A short drive from the historic market town of Framingham and the picturesque seaside village Aldeburgh. We have a range of restaurants nearby that range from fine dining to hearty pub grub. We have noted our favourites in our guidebook which will be sent to you upon booking.

In your cabin our farm is your neighbourhood and we hope you enjoy stark views across the fields packaged within serenity and wildlife. On a clear night we have unblemished views of the starry sky, with this in mind we keep lighting to a minimum around the farm, so we recommend bringing a phone with a torch/torch if arriving/leaving in the dark.

details.title: Getting around
details.content:
Part of what makes Upper Grove Farm so special is its remote location and so we recommend bringing a car. We are however on a cycle route and as such we do have guests arrive on bikes.

We can recommend local taxi firms and we are just 5 minutes from Saxmundham train station.

rules.title: Additional rules
rules.html: Please make sure muddy boots/paws are cleaned before bringing inside.

safety_features_summary: Nearby lake, river, other body of water

rules.title: Not suitable for children and infants
Nearby lake, river, other body of water
Exterior security cameras on property
rules.subtitle: “We have one security camera at the entrance to the farmyard. It only covers the car park and cannot see the cabins. ”

amenities.title: Private hot tub - available all year, open 24 hours
Long-term stays allowed

reviews.comments: Really lovely place to stay for a night, peaceful, private, and the outside bath was a nice touch.

We had the best time staying at the cabin, so much so we tried to extend our stay. The cabin is easy to find (very clear instructions), short driving distance to all amenities and beautiful walks.
The space is really well kitted out, and the little touches really made the difference
We had a lovely night away, peaceful and relaxing.
Exactly how we imagined- tranquil and cosy.

Gorgeous little place, super cosy with some lovely little touches like local tea and coffee. Didn’t get a chance to use the outdoor bath but the stars were amazing so this would be wonderful at night. Ben was very quick to respond when another place hadn’t got back to be on a reservation request, and ended up cancelling the other and coming here instead. Glad we did :)
We had a lovely stay at the farm. It’s very quiet and peaceful and the bath outside the cabin is amazing. 100% would recommend

We really felt we switched off, got away from normal life and relaxed. Calm and peaceful surroundings, we felt like our cabin and the surroundings were just for us. The host was friendly and responsive, and we had all we could need and more.
We had a wonderful stay, beautiful cute and cosy accommodation, all amenities were exactly as listed. Perfectly dog friendly, host very helpful with instructions and recommendations prior to arrival.
We had a wonderful one night stay in Bens lovely Shepard's hut. Stunning interiors and decor, amazing wood burner which we used with ease. Would highly recommend to others. Thank you

A great little stay in a good location with local shops, cafes, restaurants within short drives!
Really enjoyed and very peaceful, even with all the cabins in use you wouldn’t never know because of the spacing and layouts.
A really enjoyable and relaxing stay in the countryside. Didn’t want for anything and Ben was a great host. Would highly recommend!
Great place, lovely location and the cabin was amazing. Really nice weekend away. Ben was very accommodating and always on message. Would definitely stay again

Very nice little shepherds hut with log burning stove and outdoor bath (we visited in January when it was pretty cold but still warm enough to keep you warm). Really quiet and relaxing. We did have an issue with there being no gas / hot water when we arrived but sorted very quickly so not an issue. Some smaller kindling for the log burning stove would have been useful but we managed.
This was a lovely place to visit, we had a great time at the white horse pub and the bath was very relaxing.

Brilliant stay! We were  lucky to have clear sky through all our stay which dip in the bath in the evening made spectacular with all the stars you can get🤩 Cabin felt very cosy, didn't want to go home 🙂
Ben, was a lovely host and made sure we had everything we needed. Peaceful stay and very chilled evening. Bath outside was lovely.
Had a wonderful weekend in the cabin, well equipped and beautifully done. The bath was spotless and the recommendations were great. Definitely coming back!
Had a fantastic time, the bed was so comfy!
Fantastic! Would 100% recommend to anyone looking for a peaceful getaway. Can’t wait to be back.

Just as described, lovely peaceful weekend away.
Thanks Ben

What a find, exactly what we wanted. Very peaceful, well equiped for such a small place, hot water for outside bath in abundance. Very comfortable bed, If I had one negative to say is the decking was a little slippery but it was raining when we arrived but we just trod carefully.
Would recommend the Poachers Pocket pub, we only had a drink but the food looked amazing.
We had a trip to Aldeburgh which was lovely, had dinner at The Cross Keys pub which was really nice. Both pubs very welcoming for us and our fur baby x

Fabulous stay at Upper Grove Farm. Brilliant, responsive host. Brill location and facilities. Unique bonus of bath outside. You even get a free bag of coffee to take home with you!!
Would highly recommend.

Quiet, peaceful & relaxing. (We stayed in high winds and rain and it felt so cosy!) The cabin had everything you would need and was very clean. We’ve stayed in carriages and huts before and not had the luxury of a toilet and shower so this was an absolute bonus!! We enjoyed the bath early Sunday morning, with the high winds and slight drizzle and it was actually delightful. Ben was great at communication and responding when asked questions - thanks so much 😊 Would also recommend The Poacher’s Pocket pub for a delicious lunch before check in. (Only 4 min drive away)
We can’t wait to stay again! ☁️ 🫧 🕯️

The place was lovely however it’s portrayed on air bnb that you’re in a field on your own however this is not the case there are other cabins quite close to you which can see your decking if sitting on their chairs. Decking was covered in leaves and had a hole in it which I tripped in but this didn’t really bother us but just something to bear in mind as when you get out the bath it’s hard to not get dirty again and can’t really see hole. Bed was spotless and super comfy. However shower was piping hot and couldn’t adjust temp. Kitchen lovely also. But one thing I would say is the unforeseen costs so if we wanted to light the fire we had to pay for logs and fire starters which was quite inconvenient as for the price we paid you’d assume this was included. There were 2 mostly burnt logs in the log burner but couldn’t light without fire starters and they burnt very quickly also so this was a downside for me. But the place was lovely otherwise and great location with animals and wildlife
Great stay, it was so relaxing. We loved it and we’ll definitely come back. Highly recommended.
Had a lovely weekend away. Would highly recommend ✨❤️
Cheers Ben everything was brilliant 😄
Lovely stay, very peaceful and the outside bath was great. Dealt with a minor problem of running out of gas quickly and was very apologetic
Lovely relaxing stay, would definitely recommend.

We have just got home from the most peaceful night! I booked the cabin for my partner’s birthday, and it did not disappoint. Thanks to Ben’s guidebook, we had a fantastic meal at the Poacher’s Pocket before we checked in and we were so glad we knew about this! A beautiful area with beautiful cabins, surrounded by nature. Having the sheep, chickens, pigs, and the horse surrounding us was so lovely. The log burner and outside tub, and an extra cosy bed, made for a really wholesome night away. We will most definitely be back!

Really lovely stay. The place was super cosy and the outside bath was a great touch. Lots of lovely local pubs all within 15ish mins of the location. Easy to find with clear instructions. Also lots of lovely places to visit nearby. We visited Southwold and did the Adnams brewery tour which was around a 30 minute drive from the location. Would definitely recommend this stay and would happily visit one of Bens other stays next time.
Fantastic little getaway for me, my pregnant wife and our dog. Easy to find and clear instructions to find our cabin. We loved the outside bath and it is hot water! Would happily stay again
Super cute, loved the roll top bath. Even though there’s a few different huts it still feels super private and peaceful. Thanks for a great stay!

Lovely peaceful stay. Cosy and warm, great bathroom, all you need for a short break. Deluge of rain did not affect our time, great places to visit close by at the coast and inland.
Thankyou we would love to return xx

Really lovely location and place! Just a prewarn the bed is quiet high up so a challenge for a 5"5 heavily pregant lady but super comfortable once in. The place was as described super clean and had all the necessities. Would defo reccomend the place to anyone looking for a cozy romanic getaway! Bonus it being dog friendly! Thank you Ben!
Very nice place to stay, communication when asked questions could have been better but no faults with the accommodation, it was a lot better than expected
We had a great stay. Super easy self check in. Great setup in the accommodation, well fitted out. Overall great stay
lovely place, peaceful would recommend

Had three nights in the converted railway carriage & loved it. We used the roll top bath, even during a rainstorm, and had lots of hot water. We loved it. The wood burner is excellent & we only needed one log to change the place into a warm, cosy space. The bathroom & kitchen areas were modern & easy to use. Had our privacy & enjoyed walks with the dog both around the farm and in local area. We'd definitely book again.
Lovely place to stay. Partner was very chuffed with it as was a present for his birthday. Great space for the two of us. Clean and very peaceful.
Ben was really helpful at giving us local recommendations. The stay was absolutely beautiful and so relaxing. I would 100% book again
A lovely cabin for a night away. A peaceful and private spot with essentials included. The host was responsive and included all information needed prior to the stay.

We chose Bens place for our 2nd anniversary and it was absolutely the right choice. The shepherds hut was beautiful inside and very cosy. The roll top bath outside was extremely relaxing. Our surroundings were very peaceful, we loved being able to stay on the farm but also able to meet their horse and pigs.

The stay I had my with partner was wonderful. It was surprise present for her which made it more special. We arrived in the early evening with typical British weather, but after an hour the sun came out and we had a pleasant night.
We had dinner inside with all amenities needed all while looking over the fields.
Of course we had to try out the outdoor bathtub (room for two) and had an open fire too which added more of a romantic feel to it.
We both had a great sleep. Very peaceful. The bed was very comfortable, spacious and with a little window to see part of the sunrise.
Our two dogs came with us too and they both enjoyed it just as much. Fields to run around and a little fire to chill by.
Everything was great. The place was cosy, fun, and plenty of space, Ben was a great host and we will definitely be staying again in the near future. Fully recommend for a night or two away.

Amazing little cabin in the Suffolk countryside. Perfect for a few days of rest and relaxation. The firepit and outside bath were nice little bonuses.
Bed was really comfy and the cabin had everything we needed.
Great stay.
We had a super relaxing stay.
Really enjoyed our stay here, a very wholesome evening. Especially enjoyed the outside bath! Thank you!

Had an amazing stay for my partners birthday, it was beautiful and incredibly clean. Even the outdoor bath was spotless!! The linen and shower products provided smelled amazing, and the decor and the bathroom were lovely and modern. Brilliant stay, would definitely visit again for a little escape!
Our stay in the cabin was a perfect getaway for the night. It was peaceful, the cabin was lovely, and the outdoor bath really topped it off! Would recommend to anyone.

We had a wonderful 2 night stay in one of Ben's cosy cabins. Ben was very understanding when we had to add our dog on last minute and welcomed her warmly. The cabin was stunning and private even though it was within a field of 5 other cabins. Privacy was well thought out and the outdoor bath was a unique and lovely addition. The bed was so comfortable and we are missing the tranquility of the beautiful surroundings already. We will definitely be back. Thank you!!

What a gem! We booked this mini trip on a bit of a whim but will definitely be back! The location was great, so peaceful and the cabin had everything we needed. Ideal for bringing a dog too with the field right next to the cabin you can walk in. My particular favourite was the outdoor bath though.. bring pregnant I can’t use a hot tub and have missed them but the bath was heaven. We ate at the white horse in Badingham which is about a 5/10 minute drive and was brilliant and very friendly.
Highly recommend and looking forward to coming back already
Peaceful, comfortable and great place for a night away!

We really enjoyed a relaxing couple of nights in Ben’s hut. The hut itself is very well appointed with lots of lovely details like local fresh coffee, individual shower gels/shampoos for each guest, games, briquettes for the fire and so much more. It felt like the perfect balance of being on holiday but also feeling at home. We would love to come back soon
Perfect get away, can’t wait to book the next 😊

We had a lovely stay here. It was very peaceful and the farm animals were a great touch to enjoy. The room was great and cozy with all you would need for a short intimate stay. The host was super helpful and gave great recommendations for the area. Overall had a great time and would definitely recommend.
Great for a short stay to disconnect.

We had a two night stay over a very hot weekend. We loved having some time away from the world but not to far to go to eat out. This was our first holiday taking the dog. We all enjoyed our self. The place was clean tidy and minimalistic. It was a lovely place to go for walking though out the day and evening. The host recommended places dog friendly for us to go. Alway quick to respond when we asked questions.
Lovely place to stay if you want a break from the city life, loved the pigs! :)

The Stackyard was the perfect quiet weekend getaway from everyday life.
The property itself was as described, clean, comfortable and would happily recommend to friends and family.
Ben is great host and answered all my questions prior to arrival 👍🏻
My little boy especially loved the pigs.
Thanks for a lovely weekend 🙂

The peaceful surroundings made for a perfect getaway. The bed was incredibly comfy, ensuring a restful night's sleep. Our host was exceptionally responsive and attentive, making the stay even more enjoyable. I would definitely return again and highly recommend this place to anyone seeking a serene retreat.
We had a lovely last minute stay at Bens place. Very peaceful and comfortable, the outdoor bath is a big bonus especially on a hot evening. We will definitely be back. :)

Secluded spot in a really beautiful part of Suffolk. The cabin was cosy, well thought out and looked after - really comfy bed and huge outdoor tub for relaxing.
Close to some really amazing pubs (Sweffling White Horse is a must), and lovely pebble beaches for a swim nearby.
Would definitely recommend and visit again.
Thanks for a really special weekend :)
If Carlsberg did Shepherds huts... This is beautiful, simple elegance and embodied a sense of peace that we found hit exactly the right spot
Fantastic stay, thank you Ben. If we find ourselves in the area again we will stay for sure. Highly recommend this great little retreat!
The stay was fantastic, felt so cosy to get away from the rest of the world for a while and relax in the private cabin!

I stayed at the Farm with my 1 year old
Daughter and we had such a lovely mini break. The setting was tranquil and we loved playing in the outdoor bath. Everything was clean and cosy.. the bad weather didn’t even spoil it. Will hopefully be returning soon.
Cosy, simple, quirky. Fantastic set up, really loved it!
Such a lovely stay, would definitely stay again and for longer! The area was beautiful and perfect to just relax. Each cabin was  very private and well positioned.  Perfect for all seasons.
Fantastic weekend staying here, would definitely like to return 😊

Loved our time at Ben's place. Beautiful and peaceful surroundings within easy driving distance to amenities. Had a small issue with the boiler in our cabin but Ben was super responsive and allowed us to use the facilities in another cabin while it was being sorted. We'll be back for sure!
Excellent gateway with an accommodating host.
Loved my stay here and would highly recommend

Myself and my partner had a fantastic peaceful night away at the farm, the cabin was clean, cosy and the bed was lovely! The shower was also really good, it had great pressure and temperature. We did have a hornet in our fireplace but ben was quick to respond to our messages and offer assistance straight away but being well equipped we located the bug spray and continued enjoying our surroundings. The outside bath was definitely the highlight for us partnered with a canopy of stars due to the zero light pollution, our stay was perfect and will be returing to try a different cabin, although would happily return to the same one.

Lovely place to stay which is fairly local to us. We were looking for somewhere peaceful to celebrate my husband’s 30th birthday so this was lovely and quiet. The cabin was tidy and clean with everything you needed available. Only one bit of feedback would be maybe some more outdoor lighting on the decked area. Host was responsive and very helpful. Thank you!

Beautiful place, spotless cabin and lovely scenery.
One thing to consider is there are other cabins around you, I was under the impression it would be a private field to ourselves, while there is the privacy of the bath etc there may be other guests around.
We absolutely loved our little hut. It was the perfect spot for a wholesome getaway - we’ll be back for sure and would recommend it to everyone!

Wow what a lovely experience we had! The carriage was perfectly decorated giving country with a modern twang, very private, clean and well equipped for the perfect weekend away. The bath was a lovely touch and the shower was lovely and warm. Ben was a wonderful host and kept you up to date with all the goings on. We loved to see all of the wildlife they keep on the farm, especially Pumpkin and Pepper! Very dog friendly and lots to go and do. You won’t be disappointed!

Went to cabin for my birthday- absolutely loved it! So relaxing being off grid for 24 hours, very clean lovely cabin, super cosy! Lots of lovely walks near by in the fields. My only fault would be that the outside bath didn’t get quite hot enough. Could not fault it if that could get a little hotter. Would definitely be back :)

Our Stay was lovely! Beautiful walks and nature trails nearby, plenty of places to eat and things to do just a short drive away, Lovely host very responsive and helpful with knowledge on the local area and things to do would 100% come again, beautiful getaway

A wonderful place to stay to relax and unwind. The outside bath was a really nice touch and perfect at any time of the day!
Would definitely recommend and would book again!
Lovely farm and very cute pigs!!!
Loved it! Absolute gem.... Really peaceful and homely and the outside bath was an amazing addition. Will be staying again
Excatly as described, Ben was very responsive, had a lovely peaceful stay, would stay again!
The most lovely and relaxing stay! Had everything that we needed and the bath was such an amazing luxury. The host was so attentive. Would definitely recommend_ and will 100% be coming back :)
Great place to stay, super peaceful and private and Ben was great. We would 100% stay again
The area was nice and peaceful and the cabin is cosy and has the basics. The bath isn’t warm enough to use through the winter months. Overall the cabin was warm and clean

We had such a lovely weekend staying in the cabin hosted by Ben, it was the perfect place to unwind. The cabin itself had everything you could need, beautifully decorated and so cosy - especially with the log burner going! The outdoor bath was also a highlight and such a treat in the setting. We enjoyed walking around the farm and the surrounding countryside, and the dog did too. Ben was great with communication and offered lots of suggestions for things to do in the surrounding area. Check-in was so easy and flexible. It was also great value for money and could not have asked for more. We had a wonderful stay and would wholeheartedly recommend it. We will be back! Thank you again
We had a lovely weekend away with the dog, it was very cosy inside and had everything we needed.
We had a lovely stay at Upper Grove Farm, highly recommend it!! Thank you Ben : )

Really beautiful place and surrounding areas. Attentive and informative host with super communication prior to the stay.
A very peaceful retreat which we enjoyed thoroughly. Will definitely be visiting again.

Really enjoyed our stay at the cabin, it was so peaceful and a great place to unwind with the added bonus of being dog friendly. The outside bath was lovely, stayed warm even in -2 degree weather! Ben was a brilliant host - we can’t wait to come back.
Relaxing stay, easy to find and helpful host

Great place, exactly as advertised. We had a lovely stay and Ben was super responsive. During our stay the wind blew the fence down, within minutes of letting him know he offered to fix it. Thank you for a lovely stay!

This is the second time we've booked with Ben but this time we stayed im a different cabin, and we were not disappointed! Perfect way to start the year, so cosy and relaxing even with the rain pouring down outside! Would highly recommend 😊

We stayed here for New Year’s Eve. Lovely private retreat where we cooked dinner and played games(provided)
And brought in the new year in the outdoors bathtub. Really comfy bed and spacious bathroom.
Really recommend if you’re looking for a unique off the grid night away and not far from some pretty villages to visit.
We really enjoyed our stay in the cabin. The outdoor bath was great fun and it was so peaceful. We needed the down time. Loved the little wood burner. All round excellent.

We had a wonderful stay here for my birthday and to relax after a busy few months. It was exactly what we needed!
Loved everything about it! We particularly enjoyed seeing the animals, the outdoor bath (which was lovely and hot), visiting Aldeburgh and walking to the local village pub :)
And of course seeing such clear stars!
Great amenities in the cabin, almost everything we needed. Our only suggestion would be some cleaning products (there was washing up liquid, so just a cloth or sponge) and maybe an extra pan. This is really only minor, overall we absolutely wonderful time.

Nice stay on the Farm! Accommodation was very cozy and clean, just like described! Host was super responsive and helpful in giving directions! Field/footpath got pretty muddy after the week of rain so make sure to bring boots 😊
Beautiful stay for my partners birthday. Cosy and just what we where hoping it to be. Highly recommend. Thank you to Ben for all the information and being such a great host. Would stay again!

Ben the host was extremely helpful on directions and what to expect.
The place was so relaxing and peaceful! Everything you need to get off the main bustle of life
Highly recommended
Very quaint place! Great for a couple get away. There is no Wi-Fi. Our service worked okay most of the time. A little slow but alright.
Totally dreamy. Would 100% recommend!
Stunning location and a great stay

We had a lovely stay at Ben’s. The place was just as described, a lovely retreat away from London. Felt really peaceful and loved seeing the animals in the morning. Lots of good recommendations in the handmade guide in the cabin. Would definitely come and stay again. Only thing which isn’t clear on the page is that the other cabins are quite close so you do hear others but screened off for privacy.

The cabin was a really nice little place to stay in the Suffolk countryside, fell asleep very comfortably to the sound of rain pattering on the roof.
Ben himself went well above and beyond, being very helpful and friendly and letting us check in earlier than advertised due to us attending a wedding all afternoon.
Highly recommended.

Ben’s place is absolutely great. We used the self check-in option and even though we never met Ben, the instructions sent ahead with directions and everything we’d need during our stay (including a guidebook with food recs and to-do’s nearby) were super helpful.
It was a lovely fall weekend, and despite being such a large farm it was quiet, tranquil, and exactly what we’re hoping for to get away, relax and recharge.
If you’re looking for something in the beautiful Suffolk countryside Ben’s place has everything you could need. We’re already planning our next trip.

Lovely, home from home, bolt hole in the country.
The hut is beautifully rustic, with everything you need and added luxuries. The outdoor bath under the clearest night sky was out highlight.
Absolutely recommend!

what a fantastic place to stay!
we had the best time. Everything was so clean and it had exactly what we needed.
The outdoor bath was amazing!
Highly recommend this beautiful place. So peaceful and Ben has thought of everything.

Ben’s place is ideal for a retreat in the countryside. We wanted to switch off so made us of the amazing outdoor bath and cooked dinner in the hut, which was easy as it had everything you need! We took our dog and the he loved the field!

Two days were not enough!
We just got back from a lovely weekend away for my boyfriends birthday, and we both could have done with another couple of days.
The cabin w/ outdoor bath was lovely, exactly like the pictures. Bigger than expected but also small and intimate at the same time. It’s clearly been made with a lot of thought, love and consideration. So many smart and great uses of space. The bath was lovely, but takes a good 20 mins to fill up so give yourself plenty of time to get it ready. We are at Poachers Pocket on the first night as cannot recommend it enough. Saturday we spent the day at Southwold, then after checking out Sunday we went to Framingham and then Aldeburgh. We didn’t walk to the pub nearest to the farm, it looked quite far along narrow dark country paths and didn’t trust ourselves to get back 😂
We loved the cabin and definitely want to come back. Great location, lots to do nearby but also close to town, pubs, and places to visit. Absolutely would recommend.
Lovely place, loved the location and farm and Ben was very helpful when needed. Will be back!
Lovely, peaceful stay at the farm. Close by to both Southwold and Aldeburgh for days out. The outside bath was fantastic and the hut itself was beautifully decorated and clean. Thank you.

Myself and my partner spent a single night at the Farm and was excellent, peaceful sorroundings for a nice chilled day relaxing and recharging. Great views of the sorrounding fields with a glass of wine from the hot clean outdoor bath. The cabin was everything we wanted, clean and cosy with a good nights sleep. Highly reccomend Stackyards cabin.
A lovely, peaceful getaway at this little cabin. We made use of the outdoor bath and enjoyed a calm relaxing evening which included a nice walk in the countryside. Book with confidence!
Really lovely and secluded area. Very well communicated through Ben. Easy access to Aldeburgh / Saxmundham

My Husband and I had a lovely weekend away. The cabin is in a remote location and gives you peace and quiet to shut off and relax. The outdoor bath is superb and the bed was so comfy. Hope to be back for another stay soon

Returned from a beautiful stay at Bens place. The hut was incredible, rustic, quirky, peaceful & super clean. It has everything you need.
The outside bath is a must! Absolutely made my stay!!
The surroundings are gorgeous along with their farm yard pets - pumpkin & pickle the pigs were a huge highlight. There is also a horse, goats & sheep, it’s so lovely these guys are all pets!
Lovely area, only 20 minute drive to a lot of the local costal area’s and overall really dog friendly!
Would highly recommend and looking forward to a second visit.
Ben is always on hand and super friendly also.
Thank you for a lovely stay!
Had a lovely stay at Ben's cabin, a great location and got to say hello to pumpkin and pepper the pigs. Will definitely look at going back in the future!
Fantastic night away, peaceful and comfortable and the bath was delightful!
Had a lovely peaceful stay and the cabin was beautiful inside

Loved my stay for 2 nights the main reason I choose this place was the outdoor bath and peaceful, I am just going through a marriage breakup and needed somewhere to spend time on my own to think, it was perfect for that.  I wish I could have stayed longer but it is a bit pricey so I couldn’t afford more than 2 nights but I would highly recommend it. Met Ben he is a very nice chap.

We had a wonderful few days staying in the Stackyards! The location is perfect for being able to switch off. The surrounding area is beautiful with lots of places to walk. We also managed a day at the beach (Aldeburgh is only 20 mins away). Ben was super helpful and replied to questions quickly. The outdoor bath is such a lovely touch.  Would definitely recommend for anyone wanting some down time!
The perfect spot to forget about the world for the night. Extremely clean and private. Ben couldn’t have been a better host, so responsive and helpful, in a friendly manner.
Beautiful stay on the farm, the hut was a perfect getaway. Would recommend!.

I booked the stackyards for my partners birthday. We had an amazing weekend despite the British summer rain! The cabin was perfect, we made use of the bath which was a lovely added feature. There are plenty of walks around the area. We tried some local pubs for dinner and recommend the poachers pocket. Would highly recommend!
Such a fantastic little place to stay! Absolutely spotless and so cosy. Can't wait to stay there again!

Great stay! Perfect for what we wanted. Went to a few places suggested by Ben also and they too were spot on. Good food at Poachers Pocket. All in all, just what you want and more from a place like this.

Stayed here with the wife for our anniversary and what can I say !! It was amazing, very beautiful and extremely high spec. Weather was British summer at its best (raining) but it didn’t matter one bit, we loved using the outside bath with lots of hot water and bubbles the lit the wood burner inside to snuggle down to. This place really is a great place to hide away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life that we actually didn’t want to leave. Ben is a great host and we will definitely be returning very soon.
Nick and Lisa bishop

Ben's cabin was beautifully decorated and the space very well thought out. It had everything we needed for a relaxing stay and was pristine. The bed was comfortable and we were very cosy. The outside space was lovely and private. It was such a peaceful and secluded location but easy to find. I will definitely be staying here again. Thank you Ben for a perfect stay!

A little slice of Suffolk heaven. Ben’s place is very private, very clean and exceptionally cosy. We loved the outdoor bath which was very easy to use. The gorgeous farm animals made the stay even more special and Ben kindly left us some goat feed to feed the goats. We highly recommend and will definitely be back!

What a perfect stay! A beautiful hut in the most beautiful location. The hut itself is absolutely immaculate and beautifully decorated. Ben is just the perfect host, easy to contact, and so accommodating. We would not hesitate to stay here again and cannot recommend it highly enough!

A wonderful stay in a peaceful location. The hut has been tastefully decorated and has everything you need for a short break. We really enjoyed the outdoor bath too, a great addition. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Wow! Our first time on AirBnb and what a fabulous experience! Ben was super clear and easy to communicate with, gave really detailed instructions for check in, the property and the area.
I cant speak highly enough of the cabin - its actually bigger & better than the pictures show. The bath tub was a wonderful addition and made for a really unique experience. Exceptional quality throughout the cabin from the kitchen utensils, pans, towels, bed linen even the coffee!
Beautiful location, easy to find but extremely private and peaceful - we took a lovely walk around the farm and had so much fun watching all the animals, the little goats with their trampoline in particular.
When booking, it was more expensive than some other options but it was well worth it, to the point I feel I got a bargain for how relaxing and enjoyable our stay was!! Thanks Ben, hope to see you again soon!

I stayed in Ben’s cabin with my one-year-old son and it was absolutely perfect. It is immaculately clean, high-spec and perfectly kitted out.
We loved the outside roll top bath; it is a huge bath and there was lashings of hot water. We only stayed one night but had two baths and one shower and we were never short of hot water.
The farm is wonderful, there are horses, sheep, pigs, goats and Guinea fowl. My son adored all the animals. It is wonderfully peaceful and quiet at night.
We used the cabin as a base to get to Aldeburgh, which is only 25minutes drive away and is divine. There is also a lovely spot for strawberry picking on the way there.
Ben was very responsive and helpful.
I think this is pretty much the perfect place to stay and I can’t recommend it highly enough.
Ben has a fantastic space, cosy inside and relaxing outside. The outside bath really made it for us, we will be back!
Great stay here for a couple of nights!

We stayed for one night with the aim of a short city escape and this little cabin delivered! The area was very quiet and, with walking access to the surrounding farms, we found a wonderful spot with stunning views over the fields and a nearby pond at sundown. The cabin itself was beautifully presented. A small kitchenette gave us everything we needed - but note that there is no oven or microwave, only a gas stove (but with many small villages nearby, there are plenty of eateries to visit and explore). The bed was one of the most comfortable beds we have ever slept in.
Thank you, Ben - we had a lovely time!

Loved our stay! The cabin was super cute. Beautiful surroundings and so peaceful. Very comfortable and relaxing. Had everything we needed. The coffee and chocolate left for us was lovely and loved the outdoor bath!

We had a lovely stay at Ben's farm. The cabin was clean and beautifully decorated. There were other cabins in the field but not too close that you didn't feel you had your own private space. Beautiful Suffolk coast was just a short drive. Perfect for a weekend getaway!
Stayed at the Shepherd Hut last minute for my partners birthday and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Locally quiet rural location and we loved the pigs, goats and horses on site
Fantastic long weekend spent at Upper Grove. Ben is a fantastic host, very friendly and always available to help. Beautiful location, will be looking to return at some point.

We had a wonderful night away in Ben’s shepherds hut. The place was immaculate and very cosy and the bathtub outside made a very hot evening very pleasant indeed. The bathroom and shower were excellent too, and the kitchen was a good size. The farm is very secluded and peaceful and our dog loved exploring too. The goats are a must see also, I was particularly amused by their little trampoline! All in all we will definitely be returning, probably in the winter as we can imagine how cosy it will be then. Ben was also very helpful and communicated very well. Hope to stay again soon Ben, cheers.

Myself and my partner stayed at Bens Farm,  it has been one of the best weekends this year. It was calm and peaceful but had a range of different things to go and do within a short drive. I couldn't recommend this stay any more. Ben was so helpful.

Absolutely beautiful place to go for a staycation! The cabin was so cosy and stylish and the surrounding area was so peaceful; it was everything we wanted. We really couldn’t have asked for more. So if you are looking for a place to stay away from the business of day to day life in a stunning surroundings, this is the place for you! We’ll definitely be coming back!
We had an excellent stay, Ben was so helpful, very quick when responding. The hut was lovely, surroundings were beautiful and even better there was animals! Would definitely recommend.
Lovely and peaceful place!
Had such a peaceful stay, everything was perfect. Already recommended to one of my friends and they booked the day we stayed as they saw how beautiful it was. Would definitely return!

Had a fantastic time will go back was so relaxing & peaceful loved everything smudge the dog loved all the field walks my only gripe is I sat in the chair outside and Ben had put two cable ties round the arm as a quick fix I guess but left a long bolt sticking through I sat down and it tore a hole in my brand new Ralf loren shorts but that said it didn’t spoil are stay
Beautiful few days at the farm. Recommend the bathtub at sunset! Thanks for a wonderful time, was nice to switch off
Great relaxing little spot. outside bath was perfect.
We had the best stay at Upper Grove Farm. The cabin we stayed in was absolutely perfect, peaceful and secluded. Thanks Ben for a great stay.

Beautiful location and loved the property. The outside bath is perfect to relax in and although there are other properties near by, you are not overlooked. Wonderful place to sit and unwind in the peace and quiet of the countryside.
We had such a great time at Ben's cabin. It's a beautiful place with everything we needed. Each cabin had loads of space and privacy.
Very nice stay - lovely cabin with everything you could need, pigs were a real highlight! Area is lovely with some really nice places to eat - can recommend the Sibton White Horse.

We had the most amazing stay at this place, which was beautiful. It was a home away from home and nothing was to much trouble, loved the idea of a honesty shed.. we left change in the pot for the fire lighters after relising they were in the log pot already...
It was perfectly peaceful, outstanding and would 1000% come back again

We throughly enjoyed our stay here , lovely quality finish to the inside.
We felt disappointed with the bath out side, we followed the instructions by rinsing the bath with hot water, we just found the water didn’t come out hot enough so we aborted the idea. It was basically luke warm.
We also felt for the price we paid it would of been nice to have a few little extras when your paying more. The coffee and bar of chocolate was a nice gesture.
Overall a nice stay in a lovely location.

A very well thought and built shepherds hut for all homely needs . Great lovely location with beautiful countryside views from all angles of the accommodation. Wish stayed longer and would definitely be going back in the near future .

Lovely little stay overnight.
Lovely location and facilities.

A relaxing break in beautiful countryside. The hut was spacious with everything you could need, and some lovely local welcoming treats. the outdoor bath was amazing! And one of the comfiest beds we’ve stayed in. We brought our dog and there’s plenty of walks nearby. We recommend visiting The Poachers Pocket for some food. Will definitely be staying again, Alice
Beautiful space & so nice to be away from the city with the only noise around being animals & nature. We loved our stay, wished we were there longer! Will definitely be back.

We had a wonderful 2 nights in the carriage. It was clean and quaint with everything that you needed. Amazing log fire, with extra longs available at the honesty shop. Bed very comfy, kitchen well equipped (there is a good size fridge, with freezer box and a toaster.)
Lovely warm shower and all in all a lovely stay. The weather for us was awful, rain and wind, but we felt super cosy and comfortable in the carriage. We would definitely go back again.
We contacted Ben once, he was brilliant.
Good location, we drove to Aldeburgh and Framlingham, both are well worth a trip.
Lovely relaxing stay

A lovely cabin to stay in. Ben responds quickly and was very helpful. A quiet, private cabin with everything stated. Relaxing, easy check in. The bath takes a while to warm up and fill so it goes cold quite quickly. Aldeburgh beach only a 13 minute drive with lots of places to eat.
One of my favourite AirBnB experiences. Everything you need in a well thought out and well built cabin, on a quiet farm, near some great Suffolk towns. Highly recommended.

great stay at Ben's cabin. everything as advertised, even better then imagined. The location is perfectly situated close to many beaches (within 30 mins) if one wants both sea and countryside.
My little dog went on an exploratory journey and Ben's family was so prompt and helpful in looking for her. I really appreciated that they went above and beyond.
stay here. it's great
Had a lovely stay, would definitely go back
Lovely relaxing weekend getaway
Had a fantastically relaxing stay, a completely unique shepherds hut with a wonderful bath under the stars. Thanks Ben for looking after us so well.
Ben was a fantastic host, whom catered to all of our needs. The space was beautiful in the winter with a small wood oven burner in the corner, and the bed was so comfy. Thank you Ben!

Great stay
Nice little place, very private, secluded and relaxing
Ben’s cabin was the most magical place to stay!
Just a Beautiful setting

Our second time staying here over the NYE period and yet again the stay did not disappoint! We love how quiet and peaceful this place is and allows us to travel with our 2 four legged friends. Ben has been a great host ensuring everything was prepared for our stay. We hope to return again soon!
Great stay at Bens, super responsive and proactive host! Location was great. Had some wine in the outdoor bath, place was cosy with the log furnace and clean as a whistle. Cheers Ben we’ll be back!

Beautiful cabin in a remote location. The bath really makes this stay special. We loved the wood burner and making friends with the horses and pigs. Our dog was very happy here and we had a great time.

We had the most amazing time. Would recommend to anyone looking for a quiet, rural weekend away to really unwind & what a gorgeous setting!
Ben was also fantastic host and easily contactable. We will definitely be back!!
We celebrated my partners birthday at Bens cabin and had the most amazing time! Communication with Ben was super quick and easy. Thank you!

This is our second visit and this time we tried a different cabin to last time, again we had an amazing stay! Everything is spotlessly clean and the cabin is really well equipped and cosy. We left feeling refreshed and we will be back again for sure. Really an amazing place to stay in a beautiful setting. Can't recommend it enough!
This place is amazing. So relaxing and will definitely be returning.
A wonderful stay, can’t recommended enough! Just as the photos show, and perfect for a weekend escape!
As described! Absolutely fantastic would highly recommend
Fantastic place! Beautiful, peaceful location.  Loved the outdoor bath!

Great time at the cabin - spotted foxes and barn owls on our evening walks. Tastefully decorated and spotlessly clean, thanks Ben! A peaceful getaway weekend.
Also recommend Sur Mer at The Suffolk for dinner in Aldeburgh-they even welcomed our dog and the food was incredible!

What a great stay! The setting was beautiful and so peaceful. The cart was clean and had everything we needed, we even had a welcome drink left for us (thanks this was a great touch). Lovely walks, especially when you have a dog with you. The bath tub added that extra bit of luxury to the stay. We wouldn’t hesitate to book again.
Amazing stay at the farm - such a cute cabin, really well equipped and lots of lovely little touches! The bathtub was lush! Will definitely return x
If you want to get away from it all then I would highly recommend this place. Lovely walks very close to the cabin. Definitely recommend the outdoor bath.

A beautiful quiet stay, however, no views, as the carriage we stayed in faced the hedgerows. But very secluded and well set out.
A generous amount of goodies in the welcome hamper, maybe swap something for a small bubble bath to use in the gorgeous outside bath tub?
Overall, a gorgeous night away.
A perfect quiet get away in beautiful surroundings.

Our stay was absolute heaven. Complete privacy which is a rarity in itself. Amazing place, clean & quiet. Bathing outside was such a unique experience and a fab touch to this little paradise. We would return without hesitation. Thanks Ben!

Fantastic stay with Ben, everything was clean, fresh, and well thought through!
Most peaceful place we’ve stayed, both was very relaxed, 100% will be returning!
Great place in a secluded location. Very easy for the coast.
Most  importantly it was very peaceful.  Felt private. Cosy during the storm . Easy to find. Enjoyed the outside bath. Everything very clean. Would definitely return.

Great place to chill and read a book away from the world in a peaceful and tranquil setting - Ben is a great host, the cabin is as described, very well made and everything needed inside.
Will go back…

Nice and secluded. Clean and with all the facilities you could want except Wi-Fi. We really enjoyed the quirkiness of it all and the weather was on our side. Loved the coffee, tea and bread. Not sure I’d have enjoyed so much if it was raining though as the decking, chairs and sitting out front really made the experience. We really loved sitting out both in the evening and having coffee in the sun the next morning.

Amazing amazing stay!
The outside bath is incredible, a lovely hot bath in an extremely peaceful setting was pure bliss!
There were some super lovely little touches which made the stay even more special and we had the best time.
The location is great and all in all well worth a visit!
We had such a lovely weekend at the farm. The cabin was beautiful and we loved the extra touches! Walking around and meeting the animals was an added bonus. We would definitely consider coming back!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, and would highly recommend Ben as a host.
Thank you for your hospitality

Had an amazing time, what a great little place! Its in the perfect setting if you need to get away from it all and relax. Ben was a great host. Loved the added extras like the cans of bubbly. Great stay.  Would highly recommend

We had a very short but sweet stay at Ben's cabin, and would definitely recommend to friends and family. It looked exactly like the photos; super clean, well appointed and had everything we needed for our stay. We loved the goodies upon arrival (particularly the cold wine - ours was warm from the car journey!) and loved using the outdoor bath and fire pit, whilst our dog loved having a romp around the field and meeting the animals. There is another cabin next door, but positioned far away enough to each have your own privacy and not onlooking each other. We had a great stay and wish we could have stayed longer!

We stayed here for my husbands birthday and it was really so lovely.
All the check in was very easy and the carriages are so beautifully decorated to a high standard. We had a lovely walk to the near by pub (about 35 minutes). It was lovely just being away from the hustle and bustle of busy life!

Perfect spot for a secluded retreat. Bens place is so well thought through - little touches on arrival made us feel very welcome and at home, has everything you need for a weekend getaway. Bed was so comfy & we slept so well, no light pollution and only the sounds of the birds.
Bath outside and wood burning stove are so lovely & make for a unique experience,
Great location for a walk to the pub or to explore the quaint villages on the suffolk coast.
Would definitely recommend as a way to escape for a few nights!!
reviews.response: Thank you so much! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.comments: Fantastic place! We loved the cabin and the welcome basket was a lovely touch. Very peaceful. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would definitely return. 10/10!
Such a fab shepherds hut, me and my boyfriend had the best stay. Ben was super helpful and great with communication! Great value for money too
Great setting and the cabin itself is lovely. Very cosy,  would highly recommend!
